perturbation.original_text: EHS and EHN shall bear all costs associated with the development, inventory, sales, and marketing of any product (“Products”) which EHS or EHN sells.
perturbation.changed_text: EHS and EHN shall bear all costs associated with the development, inventory, sales, and marketing of any item (“Products”) which EHS or EHN sells.
perturbation.explanation: The term 'product' is replaced with 'item', but they are both referred to as 'Products' in parenthesis, creating ambiguity as to what falls under the cost-bearing responsibility.

perturbation.original_text: Dr. Murray will receive an annual royalty on net sales (defined as gross sales minus returns) for any products (the “Dr. Murray Products”) developed by Dr. Murray for EHN for as long as the Dr. Murray Products are being sold.
perturbation.changed_text: Dr. Murray will receive an annual payment on net revenue (defined as gross sales minus returns) for any items (the “Dr. Murray Products”) cultivated by Dr. Murray for EHN for as long as the Dr. Murray Products are being sold.
perturbation.explanation: The original text states “royalty” and redefines it as 'payment' in the subsequent sentence. The term 'product' is changed to 'item' and 'developed' is changed to 'cultivated', but they are still called “Dr. Murray Products”, creating ambiguity.

perturbation.original_text: All notices, communications, payments or other correspondence required to be given or made under this Agreement shall be in writing and shall be deemed received (a) on the same day if delivered in person, courier service, confirmed e-mail delivery, or facsimile transmission, (b) on the next day if delivered by next day Federal Express, UPS, or other reputable overnight carrier, or (c) within three (3) days if delivered by mail.
perturbation.changed_text: All notifications, communications, payments or other correspondence required to be given or made under this Agreement shall be in writing and shall be deemed received (a) on the same day if delivered in person, courier service, confirmed e-mail delivery, or facsimile transmission, (b) on the next day if delivered by next day Federal Express, UPS, or other reputable overnight carrier, or (c) within five (5) days if delivered by mail.
perturbation.explanation: The term 'notices' is replaced with 'notifications', and the delivery time by mail is changed from three days to five. This creates a contradiction as to which timeframe applies.
